name: Jaime Ruiz
content: Jaime Ruiz, Ph.D. – Ruiz HCI Lab Back to People List Jaime Ruiz, Ph.D.Associate Professorjaime.ruiz@ufl.eduhttps://www.jaimeruiz.comGoogle ScholarResearch Interests: Multimodal Interaction, Augmented Reality, HCII am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer and Information Science and Engineering at the University of Florida in Gainesville, Florida and direct the Ruiz Human-Computer Interaction Lab. I was previously an Assistant Professor at Colorado State University. I received my doctorate degree in Computer Science from the University of Waterloo in 2012 where I worked under the supervision of Dr. Edward Lank. I also hold a MS in Computer Science from San Francisco State University and a BS in Psychology from UC Davis. The main goal of my research in human-computer interaction is to develop an understanding of users and technology to support user interaction.
